name: Memory Trail - Global Game Jam 2019
description:
Memory Trial Global Game Jam 2019

Make your way home through trial and error. 

Memory Trail is a memory maze game. Precariously navigate your way across the city, heading towards home, watch out, various obstacles will stand in your way. Make use of glowing footprints to retrace steps, in a city where light is otherwise limited.  Overtime you will start mapping out the environment and eventually make your way HOME.
